translations:
lemma d_delta_arctan_upper_11: "x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) has_field_derivative diff_delta_arctan_upper_11 x) (at x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     diff_delta_arctan_upper_11 x)
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    ((\<lambda>x. - (pi / 2) - 1 / x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     1 / (x\<^sup>2 * (1 + x\<^sup>2)))
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow>
    1 / (x * x) - inverse (1 + x\<^sup>2) =
    1 / (x\<^sup>2 * (1 + x\<^sup>2))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<noteq> 0 \<Longrightarrow> 0 < diff_delta_arctan_upper_11 x
text\<open>Different proof needed here: they coincide not at zero, but at (-) infinity!\<close>

lemma arctan_upper_11:
  assumes "x < 0"
    shows "arctan(x) < arctan_upper_11 x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x
have "((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow> - (pi / 2) - 0 - (- (pi / 2))) at_bot"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow>
     - (pi / 2) - 0 - - (pi / 2))
     at_bot

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. - (pi / 2) - 1 / x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow>
     - (pi / 2) - 0 - - (pi / 2))
     at_bot
apply (intro tendsto_intros tendsto_arctan_at_bot, auto simp: ext [OF divide_inverse])

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow>
   - (pi / 2) - 0 - - (pi / 2))
   at_bot

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

proof (chain)
picking this:
  ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow>
   - (pi / 2) - 0 - - (pi / 2))
   at_bot
have *: "((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow> 0) at_bot"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow>
   - (pi / 2) - 0 - - (pi / 2))
   at_bot

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow> 0)
     at_bot

proof (state)
this:
  ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) \<longlongrightarrow> 0)
   at_bot

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 < arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>xa.
       xa \<le> x \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>y.
          ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x) has_real_derivative y)
           (at xa) \<and>
          0 < y

proof (state)
this:
  0 < arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

proof (chain)
picking this:
  0 < arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < arctan_upper_11 x - arctan x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

proof (state)
this:
  arctan x < arctan_upper_11 x

goal:
No subgoals!

lemma d_delta_arctan_upper_12:
     "((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_12 x - arctan x) has_field_derivative diff_delta_arctan_upper_12 x) (at x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_12 x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     diff_delta_arctan_upper_12 x)
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. 3 * x / (x\<^sup>2 + 3) - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     - 4 * x ^ 4 / ((x\<^sup>2 + 3)\<^sup>2 * (1 + x\<^sup>2)))
     (at x)

lemma arctan_upper_12:
  assumes "x \<le> 0" shows "arctan(x) \<le> arctan_upper_12 x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x \<le> arctan_upper_12 x

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>x \<le> y; y \<le> 0\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> diff_delta_arctan_upper_12 y \<le> 0
 2. arctan_upper_12 0 = arctan 0

definition diff_delta_arctan_upper_13 :: "real \<Rightarrow> real"
  where "diff_delta_arctan_upper_13 \<equiv> \<lambda>x. x^2 / (1 + x^2)"

lemma d_delta_arctan_upper_13:
    "((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_13 x - arctan x) has_field_derivative diff_delta_arctan_upper_13 x) (at x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_13 x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     diff_delta_arctan_upper_13 x)
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     x\<^sup>2 / (1 + x\<^sup>2))
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 1 - inverse (1 + x\<^sup>2) * 1 = x\<^sup>2 / (1 + x\<^sup>2)

lemma arctan_upper_13:
  assumes "x \<ge> 0" shows "arctan(x) \<le> arctan_upper_13 x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan x \<le> arctan_upper_13 x

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<And>y.
       \<lbrakk>0 \<le> y; y \<le> x\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> 0 \<le> diff_delta_arctan_upper_13 y
 2. arctan_upper_13 0 = arctan 0

lemma d_delta_arctan_upper_14:
  "((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_14 x - arctan x) has_field_derivative diff_delta_arctan_upper_14 x) (at x)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. arctan_upper_14 x - arctan x) has_real_derivative
     diff_delta_arctan_upper_14 x)
     (at x)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x.
         pi / 2 - 3 * x / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2) -
         arctan x) has_real_derivative
     - 4 / ((1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2)\<^sup>2 * (1 + x\<^sup>2)))
     (at x)

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<not> x\<^sup>2 < 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. 0 < 1 + x\<^sup>2

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ((\<lambda>x. 3 * x / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2)) \<longlongrightarrow> 0)
     at_infinity
apply (rule tendsto_0_le [where f = inverse and K=1])

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. (inverse \<longlongrightarrow> 0) at_infinity
 2. \<forall>\<^sub>F x in at_infinity.
       norm (3 * x / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2)) \<le> norm (inverse x) * 1

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>\<^sub>F x in at_infinity.
       norm (3 * x / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2)) \<le> norm (inverse x) * 1

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<exists>b.
       \<forall>x.
          b \<le> \<bar>x\<bar> \<longrightarrow>
          \<bar>3 * x\<bar> / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2)
          \<le> inverse \<bar>x\<bar>

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>x.
       1 \<le> \<bar>x\<bar> \<longrightarrow>
       \<bar>3 * x\<bar> / (1 + 3 * x\<^sup>2) \<le> inverse \<bar>x\<bar>
apply (simp add: power_eq_if abs_if divide_simps add_sign_intros)
text\<open>Different proof needed here: they coincide not at zero, but at (+) infinity!\<close>

lemma arctan_lower_41:
  assumes "x < 0"
    shows "arctan(x) > arctan_lower_41 x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan_lower_41 x < arctan x

proof (prove)
using this:
  0 < - x \<Longrightarrow> arctan (- x) < arctan_upper_44 (- x)
  x < 0

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. arctan_lower_41 x < arctan x
